title: Understanding Photoluminescence
text: Photoluminescence involves the absorption and re-emission of light. Can you think of a common example where this occurs?

title: Energy Levels in Photoluminescence
text: When a substance absorbs photons, it moves to a higher energy state. What happens when it returns to a lower energy state?

hintAnswer: Light is emitted when a substance returns to a lower energy state.
title: Emission of Light
text: What is emitted when a substance returns to a lower energy state after absorbing photons?

title: Applications of Photoluminescence
text: Photoluminescence is used in various fields. Can you name one application in spectroscopy?

hintAnswer: Photoluminescence is used to analyze the composition and properties of materials.
title: Spectroscopy Application
text: How is photoluminescence used in spectroscopy?
choices: To analyze the composition and properties of materials
